author: Staff Reporter
text:
Public talks on

Science

The Institute of Mathematical Sciences is organising a set of four public talks on different aspects of science at The Music Academy (TTK Auditorium) on Sunday, February 14, between 4 and 7.30 p.m.

These talks are aimed at those with an interest towards science.

The programme is absolutely free and open to the public.

All participants need required to register online in advance.

More details concerning the programme, the schedule and how to register are available at the site:http://www.imsc.res.in/triveni

- Staff Reporter
title: Public talks on science
